DOC.brief_summary: To obtain further information on the tolerability and efficacy of Atrovent® inhalets in long term treatment of Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease under conditions of daily practice
DOC.brief_title: Postmarketing Surveillance of Atrovent® in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: Primarily patients of both gender, older than 40 years, who suffer from Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease Only patients who had not been treated with Atrovent® within the last year were to be considered for inclusion • Contraindications listed in the Instructions for Use/Summary of Product Characteristics for Atrovent® Inhalets
